com.tractrac.subscription.lib.api

Interface ILocalDataserver


  • public interface ILocalDataserver

    This class is a local dataserver. It is possible to add events and connect to it order to test the implementation of the subscription library.

    Author:
    Jorge Piera Llodrá

      • addLivePosition

        void addLivePosition(ICompetitor competitor,
                   double lon,
                   double lat,
                   long timestamp)
        Adds a live position to the dataserver. This position will be sent if the application is subscribed to the competitor positions event using the live connection.
        Parameters:
        competitor - the competitor
        lon - the longitude
        lat - the latitude
        timestamp - the time stamp when this position is valid

      • addStoredPosition

        void addStoredPosition(ICompetitor competitor,
                     double lon,
                     double lat,
                     long timestamp)
        Adds a stored position to the dataserver. This position will be sent if the application is subscribed to the competitor positions event using the stored connection.
        Parameters:
        competitor - the competitor
        lon - the longitude
        lat - the latitude
        timestamp - the time stamp when this position is valid
